question.title: WSO2 Mi 4.2.0 Unresolved Requirement Error
question.body:
I have newly deployed my wso2-mi-4.2.0 service on Linux RHEL 8.5 server. Once I start my service getting below error.

Java Version : openjdk version "11.0.22" 2024-01-16 LTS

[2024-02-09 00:55:15,731] ERROR {Events.Framework} - FrameworkEvent ERROR org.osgi.framework.BundleException: Could not resolve module: org.wso2.micro.integrator.dataservices.core [202] Unresolved requirement: Import-Package: com.hp.hpl.jena.query; version="0.0.0"

Below is my logs stack.

TID: [2024-02-09 00:55:11,897]  INFO {org.wso2.config.mapper.ConfigParser} - Overriding files in configuration directory /opt/wso2mi-4.2.0 {org.wso2.config.mapper.ConfigParser}

    -> Export-Package: org.wso2.micro.integrator.dataservices.core.odata; bundle-symbolic-name="org.wso2.micro.integrator.dataservices.core"; bundle-version="4.2.0"; version="4.2.0"; uses:="com.datastax.driver.core,javax.servlet.http,org.apache.olingo.commons.api.data,org.apache.olingo.commons.api.edm,org.apache.olingo.commons.api.edm.provider,org.apache.olingo.commons.api.http,org.apache.olingo.server.api,org.apache.olingo.server.core,org.apache.olingo.server.core.requests,org.apache.olingo.server.core.responses,org.apache.olingo.server.core.uri.parser,org.jongo,org.wso2.micro.integrator.dataservices.core"
